problem: Traditional English learning centers in Uzbekistan are expensive ($50-100/mo) and geographically inaccessible for rural families. Furthermore, existing school curriculums focus on grammar, leaving students with zero speaking confidence and 'mute English' syndrome.
audience: The Aspiring Student (8-16 y/o): Uses Telegram daily, loves games, shy to speak in class.
The Investor Parent: Wants a brighter future for their child, trusts Telegram, looks for affordable alternatives to private tutors.
user_stories: As a student, I want to send a voice message in English and get instant AI feedback on my pronunciation, so I can improve without embarrassment.
As a student, I want to earn 'XP' and badges for daily streaks, so that learning feels like a game.
As a parent, I want to receive a weekly progress report via Telegram, so I know my money is being well spent.
As a parent, I want to pay for a subscription using Click or Payme directly inside the chat, so the process is frictionless.

mvp: Telegram Bot Interface: No app download required.
AI Voice Coach: STT (Speech-to-Text) + LLM correction + TTS (Text-to-Speech) for conversational practice.
Daily Micro-Lessons: 5-minute automated vocabulary and grammar drills pushed at 5 PM daily.
Gamification Engine: Daily streaks, simple leaderboard (local vs global), and virtual currency.
Local Payment Gateways: Direct integration with Click and Payme API for recurring payments.
future: Peer-to-Peer Battles: Live quizzes against other students.
IELTS Mock Simulator: AI-driven speaking test scoring.
Video Avatar Mode: Generating a visual AI teacher for visual learners.

monetization: Freemium Subscription Model. Free Tier: 10 mins/day conversation + basic vocab. Premium Tier (49,000 UZS/month): Unlimited AI voice conversation, detailed grammar correction, and parent dashboard.
metrics: DAU (Daily Active Users): Target 5,000 in Month 3.
Voice Engagement: Average voice messages sent per user per day.
